title: Sick backyard. Good eats nearby. Great train options.
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


93 Himrod apt 1R UPSTAIRS: 3 full BR + large livingroom & full bath. DOWNSTAIRS: A space equal to the upstairs which can be utilized as a 4th bedroom and second living room OR 2 other bedrooms + another half bath. Awesome backyard. top-to-bottom reno 2 years ago. Dishwasher, laundry, HVAC systems w/ remote controls in every room, iPhone docks w/ built in speakers in every room. Sick backyard. Good eats nearby. Great train options.

AMENITIES
• High Ceilings
• Hardwood floors
• Central A/C
• Video Intercom
• Laundry in building
• Eat In Kitchen
• Stainless Steel Appliances
• Dishwasher
• Shared backyard
• Outdoor Space
• Duplex

If you are interested in a showing please text Kirby at 929-243-4946 !!
Mention listing ID:1390!!
Must meet income and credit requirement.
